comment._content: A lovely old picture of an elegent old ship, thank you for sharing NMM.

comment.author: 68312035@N07
comment._content:
Do you have more information about this boat?

Is it the Iquique of the "Iquique Ship Company", built in 1892?

comment.author: 11334970@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/68312035@N07] Hi Avel Keltia, This picture is of the Iquique built in 1892. Everett painted several paintings on the Iquique while he was aboard and which appear in the Museum's online catalogue. These records may provide you with some more information about the ship. An example is available here collections.nmm.ac.uk/collections/objects/13924.html Thanks Lucinda

comment._content: I wonder if this ship es named after my beloved chilean city.
